mapper.select: /* 게시판 목록 조회 - selectBoardList */ SELECT BBS_TYP , BBS_NO , BBS_TITLE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BBS_INS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BBS_INS_DT FROM T_BBS WHERE BBS_TYP = #{bbsTyp} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

/* 게시판 게시글 조회 - selectDetail */ SELECT BBS_TYP , BBS_NO , BBS_TITLE , BBS_CONTENT , DOC_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BBS_INS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BBS_INS_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BBS_LST_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BBS_LST_DT , USER_ID FROM T_BBS WHERE BBS_TYP = #{bbsTyp} AND BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
